lead_paragraph: The announcement came separately from the kingdom’s selection of male athletes. Women in Saudi Arabia must obtain a man’s permission to travel.

headline.print_headline: Saudi Team at Games Will Include 4 Women
headline.main: Saudi Arabia Will Send Four Women to the Olympics

snippet: The announcement came separately from the kingdom’s selection of male athletes. Women in Saudi Arabia must obtain a man’s permission to travel....
abstract: Saudi Arabia announces four female athletes to compete in 2016 Olympic Games.
